question: Largest Fresh water aquarium of India inaugurated in ________________.
explanation: Largest Fresh water aquarium of India inaugurated in Jharkhand. Minister Raghubar Das inaugurated the India's largest fresh water aquarium "Ranchi Machchli Ghar" at Bhagwan Birsa Munda Biodiversity Park in Ranchi to encourage tourism in the state. It is established over 36,000 square feet area and it has 58 fish tanks, where 120 species of 1500 fishes have been exhibited. Besides Indian breeds, rare and popular species of Fish have been brought in from Bangkok, Malaysia and Singapore.
